caption.p: Results of seed germination in green house ( A) seeds germinated per week on mowed and unmowed plants (P < 0.002), ( B) seeds germinated per week with GA 3 treatment and control (P = 0.974), ( C) Seeds germinated over time (early vs late season) (treatment P < 0.006; GA 3 P = 0.977), mowed and GA 3 (orange) and unmowed and control (blue) plants. Means are shown by scale bars and asterisk denotes significantly different results at P < 0.05, while ns denotes non-significant results.
